alert.note: Alert for Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 12:50PM CDT until October 12 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RACINE AND EASTERN KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 1250 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wind Point to near Sturtevant to Antioch, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Sturtevant, Wind Point, Caledonia, Bristol, Somers, Elmwood Park, North Bay and Franksville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
